title: kafka topic design
description: design topics, partitions, keys, and retention for your workload.
context: opt for keying that preserves ordering where needed; avoid hot partitions.
instructions: 1) propose topic namespacing and conventions. 2) pick partitions/replication factoring in throughput and ordering. 3) define retention/compaction. 4) outline dead letter topics.
model_tips: use compacted topics for state-like streams.
